content: By: Bethan Vincent August 14, 2023 Balancing Creativity With Caution When Using AI to Create Content Content Marketing | Marketing Industry | AI and SEO Using AI tools like ChatGPT for content creation can offer marketers the allure of simplifying the writing process, but it comes with risks. To leverage AI effectively, Bethan Vincent has detailed guidelines for balancing creativity with caution. Read this post By: Kavi Kardos August 11, 2023 Site Architecture for Resource & Content Libraries — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Content Marketing Kavi outlines a four-step process for building resource and content libraries. The process includes auditing for technical and content-related issues, mapping out a new structure, migrating the content with redirects, and redesigning the site to match the new structure. Read this post By: Meghan Pahinui August 9, 2023 Unlocking the Future of Tomorrow: MozCon 2023 Day Two Recap SEO Events | Moz News Catch up on the second and final day of MozCon 2023 in this day-two recap! Read this post By: Emilie Martin August 8, 2023 Blast Off Into the Future: MozCon 2023 Day One Recap SEO Events | Moz News We journeyed into the future of the industry on the first day of MozCon. Discover key takeaways from our speakers in this day-one recap. Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers August 7, 2023 Introducing Brand Authority: Measuring the Unmeasurable Moz News | Moz Tools Learn more about Moz's new metric, Brand Authority, which solves the difficult task of quantifying brand strength. Read this post By: Areej AbuAli August 4, 2023 Site Architecture Optimization for Seasonality — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | Technical SEO Areej discusses site architecture optimization for seasonality in this edition of Whiteboard Friday. The key focus is on asking yourself when your business’s peak periods occur and strategically planning before, during, and after those periods. Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers August 1, 2023 Twitter’s Brand Equity: 17 Years & 12 Million Keywords Social Media | Search Engines Twitter’s rebrand to 'X' poses significant SEO challenges, as Twitter's brand equity is deeply rooted in millions of branded searches that may not directly carry over to the new 'X' brand. This could potentially lead to a considerable loss of search traffic for a prolonged period. This rebrand is one to watch for SEOs worldwide. Read this post By: Kelsey Libert July 31, 2023 How To Earn High-Authority Links That Drive Rankings Link Building | Public Relations | SEO Consulting Learn about the importance of digital PR and link-building in this article by Kelsey Libert. Discover how can you consistently earn media coverage, while avoiding spammy link networks. Read this post By: Lazarina Stoy July 28, 2023 Data Storytelling: Skills and Elements — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | SEO Analytics Join Lazarina in this Whiteboard Friday where she discusses the critical skills and elements involved in data storytelling. Learn about data analysis, and data visualization, as well as how to communicate wins and balance relationships with stakeholders. Read this post By: Duane Brown July 26, 2023 Use Google Ads AI & Machine Learning To Run Better Campaigns Paid Search Marketing (PPC) | Online Advertising | AI and SEO Discover how to maximize the potential of Google Ads through AI and machine learning in this article. Learn how to prioritize your ecommerce data, leverage 1st party data, optimize product images, titles, and descriptions, and build a comprehensive shopping feed. Discover the benefits of Google Merchant Center's automatic improvements to ensure up-to-date and high-quality data. Read this post By: Zach Edelstein July 24, 2023 6 Ways ChatGPT Can Improve Your SEO Marketing Industry | SEO Tools | AI and SEO From on-page optimizations to technical SEO, AI can do more than create content. Supercharge your organic traffic with these tips from Moz’s SEO Director. Read this post By: Helen Pollitt July 21, 2023 How SEOs and UX Designers Can Work Better Together — Whiteboard Friday Whiteboard Friday | User Experience (UX) There are a lot of similarities between SEOs and UX designers, and we often have the same goals. How can we work to understand more of the UX designers' priorities and help to communicate our priorities to them? Learn all about how SEOs and UX designers can work better together in this edition of Whiteboard Friday.
